description: This header file defines utility functions and macros for string manipulation, conversion, and validation, including functions to convert strings to integers and doubles, and to validate IP addresses and hostnames.

methods.name: AnscStrBufGetCharNum
methods.description: Counts the number of occurrences of a specific character within a string buffer of a given length.

methods.name: AnscStrGetCharNum
methods.description: Counts the number of times a specific character appears in a null-terminated string.

methods.name: AnscDupString
methods.description: Duplicates a given string and returns a new copy.

methods.name: AnscMemUtilRealloc
methods.description: Reallocates a memory block to a new size, possibly copying the old data.

methods.name: AnscValidStringCheck
methods.description: Checks whether a string is valid (non-null and non-empty).

methods.name: AnscValidStringCheck2
methods.description: Checks whether a string contains any invalid characters.

methods.name: is_IpAddress
methods.description: Validates whether a string is a valid IPv4 address.

methods.name: is_Ipv6_address
methods.description: Validates whether a string is a valid IPv6 address.

methods.name: is_ValidHost
methods.description: Validates whether a string is a valid hostname.

methods.name: is_ValidPort
methods.description: Validates whether a string is a valid port number.

methods.name: is_ValidIpAddressv4_port
methods.description: Validates whether a string is a valid IPv4 address with port.

methods.name: is_ValidIpAddressv6_port
methods.description: Validates whether a string is a valid IPv6 address with port.

methods.name: is_PrivateIp
methods.description: Checks whether a given IP address is in a private range.
